results.content: Decent course but I wouldn't say it's "everything" you need to know. It does a good job of getting the thought process going to plan out a basic framework for starting out in the WebDev field, as well as some good resources to test out tools and make the workflow more efficient. This course is more of a beginner's roadmap, which is not a bad thing and can really help point someone in the right direction with room to build upon.
